Name: Agios Nikolaos
Description: A peaceful, residential neighborhood known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to schools and parks.

Name: Liosia
Description: An area characterized by its strong community presence and local small businesses, offering a more laid-back, suburban lifestyle.

Name: Aigaleo Park
